post_text: September 27, 2016 at 10:27â€¯AM#1Hi,I would like to create a macro to assign the cmd of a cue.Example like assign cmd "goto cue 10" cue 9 sequence 1How can I do that?And also the macro to assign loop to a specific cue,I've found the assign cue x/loop=x is workshowever, I can't find the right key to turn it off, 'assign cue x/loop=off' ??Thank you
title: Macro to change command
